term.title: ketoaldonic acids

item.text: Monosaccharides in which a structure containing a keto group and a carboxylic acid group is in equilibrium with a hemiacetal structure. Specific compounds are named using the -ulosonic acid suffix. E.g. d-arabino-hexulosonic acid: [image: Not defined]
